original_text: When poor people cannot pay their debts, you buy them as your slaves. You pay a silver coin to buy them, which would not even buy a pair of shoes. You also mix dust with the grain that you sell.
korean_text: 은으로 힘없는 자를 사며 신 한 켤레로 가난한 자를 사며 찌꺼기 밀을 팔자 하는도다

sentences.original_text: When poor people cannot pay their debts
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 사람들이 빚을 갚지 못할 때

sentences.original_text: you buy them as your slaves
You pay a silver coin to buy them
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들을 사기 위해 은화 한 닢을 지불합니다

sentences.original_text: which would not even buy a pair of shoes
sentences.korean_translation: 그 돈으로는 신발 한 켤레도 살 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: You also mix dust with the grain that you sell
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 또한 팔 곡식에 먼지를 섞습니다
